@Ravenleaf She gets off on causing him pain...that's it. There is no love, she just enjoys seeing the pathetic guy in anguish. Seriously, the guy should have left her ass a long time ago and this last(?) chapter proves it. He means nothing more to her than to satisfy her newfound sadistic streak. And that's mostly because he sits and takes it so "perfectly" for some stupid reason(probably delusional thinking that she still loves him... ha!).

@ComeOnBunny No, he was manipulated into this. The rapist is the one that did all this. MC's just going along with it because he's an idiot that can't let go of a lost cause(being his so called "girlfriend").

I'm amazed by how this is getting crueler and crueler. Basically the story goes on with her picking another wimpy, insecure beta guy, but instead of cucking him and never fucking him and torturing him and bullying him and humiliating him like she did with MC, she instead fucks him and praises him and fills him with joy and happiness making him lose his virginity. All in front of the MC who just had the sad fate of being her first target. Here he suffers from jealousy of seeing what should have been his happy ending, which he was denied while some random guy not better than him was given for no other reason than to make him suffer.
